scripts.build: (IMAGE_OPTIMIZATION_MODE=imgix; export IMAGE_OPTIMIZATION_MODE; next build && next export)
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:static && npm run deploy:assets
scripts.deploy:assets: aws s3 cp out s3://spencerrc-website/ --metadata-directive REPLACE --recursive --cache-control max-age=21600 --exclude '*.jpg' --exclude '*.png' --exclude '*.webp'
scripts.deploy:static: aws s3 cp out s3://spencerrc-website/ --metadata-directive REPLACE --recursive --cache-control max-age=31536000 --exclude '*' --include '*.jpg' --include '*.png' --include '*.webp'
